thig13.1:1.1: "Curly hair, black like the color of bees,
thig13.1:1.2: sprung from this head of mine,
thig13.1:1.3: it is aging like hemp bark,
thig13.1:1.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:2.1: Scents like from a godly casket,
thig13.1:2.2: sprung from this head of mine full of flowers,
thig13.1:2.3: that hair on your body is as fragrant as old age,
thig13.1:2.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:3.1: Hair growing thick like a forest grove,
thig13.1:3.2: made resplendent, and gathered at the top with comb and hairpins.
thig13.1:3.3: It is now thinning here and there,
thig13.1:3.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:4.1: Shining hair, adorned with plaits of black and gold,
thig13.1:4.3: Because of old age your head is gone bald,
thig13.1:4.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:5.1: My eyebrows before were such a splendor,
thig13.1:5.2: so well done like they were drawn by a painter.
thig13.1:5.3: Because of old age they are hanging down with folds and wrinkles,
thig13.1:5.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:6.2: bright and beautiful like a gem.
thig13.1:6.3: When they're struck by old age all the sparkle vanishes,
thig13.1:6.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:7.2: shining at the peak of youth,
thig13.1:7.3: Because of old age is is sagged,
thig13.1:7.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:8.1: My earlobes were such a splendor,
thig13.1:8.2: like bracelets well made from start to finish.
thig13.1:8.3: Because of old age they are hanging down with folds and wrinkles,
thig13.1:8.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:9.1: The color of a plantain bud,
thig13.1:9.3: Because of old age they went broken and black,
thig13.1:9.4: the word of the speaker of truth is unmistakable.
thig13.1:10.1: I had a sweet hum like a cuckoo,
thig13.1:10.2: chirping from a forest grove to a jungle thicket.
thig13.1:10.3: Because of old age it is now faltering here and there,
